TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContentAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies alignment of content on the drawing surface.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the ContentAlignment enumeration. To run this example paste this code into a Windows Form that contains a label named `Label1` and call the `IntializeLabel1` method in the form's constructor.
[!code-cs[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.content_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#7](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.content_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.content_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment BottomCenter = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the bottom, and horizontally aligned at the center.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment BottomLeft = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the bottom, and horizontally aligned on the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment BottomRight = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the bottom, and horizontally aligned on the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment MiddleCenter = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned in the middle, and horizontally aligned at the center.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment MiddleLeft = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned in the middle, and horizontally aligned on the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment MiddleRight = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned in the middle, and horizontally aligned on the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment TopCenter = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the top, and horizontally aligned at the center.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment TopLeft = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the top, and horizontally aligned on the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.ContentAlignment TopRight = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Content is vertically aligned at the top, and horizontally aligned on the right.
